subject: CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert
body:
CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert






 



Alert Name: My Custom Alert
Victim's dad gets rights to O.J. Simpson's book

06/15/07 01:37 PM, EDT
A Miami bankruptcy judge on Friday gave the father of Ron Goldman the rights to a book by O.J. Simpson that speaks in hypothetical terms about the 1994 murders of Goldman and Simpson's ex-wife, Nicole.
FULL STORY
